in my opinion these are the pros and cons about this student care:

pros:

cons:

‚Ä¢ the principal omg acts so annoying  when i see him. he is rlly biased and also cheap. he shouts when we make too much noice while they hv tution but they let us play one so like what they expectüíÄ

‚Ä¢their homecook meals are rlly unhealthy. (some of them) sometimes right, they only serve beehoon with egg and sausages and also fish cakes. it‚Äôs not healthy?!?! the meals are also not really balanced meals such as nuggets and broccoli like huh??!

‚Ä¢ they gossip so much about their students . i alw hear them talking bad things about students behind their back like i don‚Äôt think they should do that you know it‚Äôs not rlly good imo.

‚Ä¢also, it‚Äôs not a conducive place to study at bc it‚Äôs so noisy. (the children playing and the teachers banging the table) therefore during my psle prep it was hard for me to concentrate

plz don‚Äôt go it‚Äôs traumaüíÄüôèüôè
